com.whirlycott.cache
Interface Cache

All Known Implementing Classes:
CacheDecorator
public interface Cache

Defines a simple interface that all caches should implement.

Author:
phil

Returns:
object identified by provided key.

retrieve

java.lang.Object retrieve(Cacheable key)
Retrieve an object whose key implements Cacheable. The onRetrieve() method will be executed here.

Parameters:
key -
Returns:
the object retrieved from the cache.

           java.lang.Object value)
Store an object in the cache with a Cacheable key. The onStore() method will be executed here.

Parameters:
key -
value -

store

void store(java.lang.Object key,
           java.lang.Object value,
           long expireTime)
Store an object in the cache.

Parameters:
key - - the key to retrieve the object later.
value - - the object to be cached.
expireTime - - milliseconds that this item should be kept in the cache (accurate to tuner-sleeptime seconds, as specified in whirlycache.xml.

store

void store(Cacheable key,
           java.lang.Object value,
           long expireTime)
Store an object in the cache with a Cacheable key. The onStore() method is execute here.

Parameters:
key - - the key to retrieve the object later.
value - - the object to be cached.
expireTime - - milliseconds that this item should be kept in the cache (accurate to tuner-sleeptime seconds, as specified in whirlycache.xml.

Remove an object from the cache.

Parameters:
key - key associated with object to remove.
Returns:
object that was removed.
